title: Samsung ends software support for the Galaxy S9 and Galaxy S9 Plus
content:
The Galaxy S9 and Galaxy S9 Plus, Samsung’s flagship phones from 2018, has reached the end of life (EoL). Both phones wonâ€™t receive any new software updates from Samsung anymore, with the March 2022 security update being the last one. Samsung has quietly removed the Galaxy S9 and Galaxy S9 Plus from its mobile security

The post Samsung ends software support for the Galaxy S9 and Galaxy S9 Plus appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Samsung has quietly removed the Galaxy S9 and Galaxy S9 Plus from its mobile security page. Read on to know more.
